channel.title: Need Players - Short Notice
channel.description:
Just wanted to clarify something...
There is no area in Forums for Short notice games? Slack channel has Need Players.
Patron $8 tier for Slack - Need Players (short notice games) AND for RSVP - Calendar.
So you can use Calendar and Forums without the $8 tier, but not Short notice games.
So the $8 tier allows you to do short notice games and get first pick for calendar games.
IF your life-work schedule is short notice, you HAVE to get $8 tier else you've got no chance of getting a game.
This does seem like the haves and have nots, is there no option for a Need Players section of the Forums?
